effect_entries.effect:
When this Pokémon enters battle, it reveals the move with the highest base power known by any opposing Pokémon to all participating trainers.

In the event of a tie, one is chosen at random.

Moves without a listed base power are assigned one as follows:

Power | Moves
----: | -----
  160 | One-hit KO moves: fissure, guillotine, horn drill, and sheer cold
  120 | Counter moves: counter, metal burst, and mirror coat
   80 | Variable power or set damage: crush grip, dragon rage, electro ball, endeavor, final gambit, flail, frustration, grass knot, gyro ball, heat crash, heavy slam, hidden power, low kick, natural gift, night shade, psywave, return, reversal, seismic toss, sonic boom, trump card, and wring out
    0 | Any such move not listed
effect_entries.short_effect: Reveals the opponents' strongest move upon entering battle.

flavor_text_entries.flavor_text:
出场时，
只读取１个对手拥有的招式。

登場　したとき
相手の　持つ　技を
ひとつだけ　読み取る。

When it enters a battle, the Pokémon can tell one of
the moves an opposing Pokémon has.

Quando il Pokémon entra in campo, rivela la mossa
più potente del nemico.

Determina el movimiento más potente del rival al
entrar en combate.

Gibt bei Kampfantritt Auskunft über eine Attacke
aus dem Repertoire des Gegners.

Révèle l’une des capacités de l’ennemi quand
le combat commence.

出場時，預見1個
對手持有的招式。

등장했을 때
상대가 지닌 기술을
하나만 꿰뚫어본다.

とうじょう　したとき
あいての　もつ　わざを
ひとつだけ　よみとる。

相手の　持つ　技を
読 取ることが　できる。

Determines what moves
an opposing Pokémon has.

Scopre la mossa più potente
del nemico.

Determina el movimiento más
potente del rival.

Gibt Auskunft über das Attacken-
Repertoire des Gegners.

Découvre la capacité ennemie la
plus puissante.

꿰뚫어볼 수 있다.

あいての　もつ　わざを
よ とることが　できる。

相手の　持つ　技を
読み取ることが　できる。
